version_description:
Thank you for being a Premise contributor!

We update our app regularly to bring you exciting new features and enhancements to tasks. This latest update includes improvements to task submissions and bug fixes.

We’re always working to make your Premise experience even better. Please check back often to access new tasks, earn money, and share your local knowledge!

Thank you for being a Premise contributor!

We update our app regularly to bring you exciting new features and enhancements to tasks. This latest update includes bug fixes.

We’re always working to make your Premise experience even better. Please check back often to access new tasks, earn money, and share your local knowledge!
Contributors from special Premise programs can now join our app!

Thank you for being a Premise contributor!

We update our app regularly to bring you exciting new features and enhancements to tasks. This latest update includes a bug fix that allows you to log into Premise using your Facebook account. 

We’re always working to make your Premise experience even better. Please check back often to access new tasks, earn money, and share your local knowledge!
Bug fixes and UI updates

Fixes a scrolling issue when selecting an Explore task from the map.
Dismiss the "Market" tutorial when navigating to "My Tasks" via offline banner.
Fixes issue that prevented users from attempting to resubmit tasks after cancelling initial submission.
Other minor UI changes and bug fixes

App performance improvements
Minor bug fixes

New in this release:

- 30 new language options: Bahasa Indonesia, Bosnian, German, Spanish (Latin America), Spanish, French, Italian, Hausa, Lithuanian, Portuguese (Brazil), Serbian (Latin),  Filipino (Philippines), Albanian, Somali, Swahili, Turkish, Vietnamese, Russian, Armenian, Urdu, Pashto, Arabic, Persian (Afghanistan), Amharic, Bangla, Thai, Khmer, Korean, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional, Taiwan), Chinese (Traditional, Hong Kong)

- Language selection in app settings

- Minor bug fixes

New in this release:
Minor bug fixes

Colors update
App icon update
Splash Screen update
Bug fixes

We’ve fixed a few things behind the scenes to keep Premise running smoothly. Here are a couple updates you’ll find in the latest release:

Improved user experience 
Performance improvements 
Localization updates 
Bug fixes
